text: Feel Something is the second studio album by British band The History of Apple Pie. It was released on 30 September 2014 under Marshall Teller Records. ==Critical reception== Feel Something was met with generally favourable reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 68, based on 10 reviews. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:The History of Apple Pie albums
title: Feel Something (The History of Apple Pie album)
